class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnit
class.meta: Domain entity representing a unit of movement

property.name: arUnitArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this unit was archived.

property.name: arUnitOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arUnitId
property.meta: Unit Identifier:Container number, Chassis number, Marks and Numbers, etc. An name by which people identify this Unit.

property.name: arUnitForeignHostKey
property.meta: Unique key of the Unit in a foreign host (if any).

property.name: arUnitVisitState
property.meta: The current state of the Unit.

property.name: arUnitNeedsReview
property.meta: If true, Unit was created on-the-fly and needs to be manually reviewed.

property.name: arUnitArePlacardsMismatched
property.meta: False if Unit's Hazard placards and observed placards match, True otherwise

property.name: arUnitDeclaredIbCvGkey
property.meta: Gkey of the declared/documented inbound carrier to the Complex, which may differ from the actual

property.name: arUnitDeclaredIbCvId
property.meta: CvId of the declared/documented inbound carrier to the Complex, which may differ from the actual

property.name: arUnitCategory
property.meta: The Category of the Unit (Import, Export, ...).

many-to-one.name: arUnitComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this Unit belongs.
true

many-to-one.name: arArchiveUnitGoods
many-to-one.meta: The Goods associated with this Unit. May be null.

property.name: arUnitDeckRqmnt
property.meta: A stowage requirement: Above Deck Only, Below Deck Only, or Don't Care

property.name: arUnitRequiresPower
property.meta: True if Unit needs power to its reefer unit, or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air

property.name: arUnitIsPowered
property.meta: True if Unit is connected to electrical supply or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air exchange

property.name: arUnitWantPowered
property.meta: True if opertions wants Unit connected to electrical supply or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air exchange

property.name: arUnitPowerRqstTime
property.meta: Time of last power state change request

property.name: arUnitIsAlarmOn
property.meta: True if Unit alarm is on

property.name: arUnitValidateReleaseGroup
property.meta: True if release group must be validated

property.name: arUnitIsTransferableRelease
property.meta: True if release can be transferred to another Unit

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKg
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight)

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKgAdvised
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) when the container was booked/advised.

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKgGateMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by gate scales.

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKgYardMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by CHE in yard.

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKgQcMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by Quay Crane.

property.name: arUnitIgnorePayloadWeights
property.meta: If true, do not add weight of payload units when calculating total weight

property.name: arUnitIgnorePayloadHeights
property.meta: If true, do not add height of payload units when calculating total height

property.name: arUnitIsCtrSealed
property.meta: True if any of the four seals has a value

many-to-one.name: arUnitActiveUfv
many-to-one.meta: The most recently activated child UFV, though not necessarily ACTIVE now
protected

set.name: arUnitArUeSet
set.meta: The set of all UnitEquipments for this Unit.

property.name: arUnitPrimaryUeId
property.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the primary unit equipment. Can be null.

property.name: arUnitCarriageUeId
property.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the carriage unit equipment. Can be null.

property.name: arUnitIsBundle
property.meta: True if Unit is a Bundle

property.name: arRtgOPLId
property.meta: Original Port of Loading (international cargo was relayed through a domestic port of loading)

property.name: arRtgDeclaredCvGkey
property.meta: gkey of Declared Carrier Visit (may differ from actual!) before archive

property.name: arRtgDeclaredCvId
property.meta: cvId of Declared Carrier Visit (may differ from actual!)

property.name: arRtgDescription
property.meta: Source of the instructions for the routing change (fax received, e-mail, etc.)

property.name: arRtgTruckingCompanyId
property.meta: Option to change from the one that is associated with the delivery group

property.name: arRtgBondTruckingCompanyId
property.meta: Trucking Company id which is responsible to pick up the Container that has been marked for either Offsite Exam or is being taken Offsite into Inbond

many-to-one.name: arUnitArchiveImportDeliveryOrder
many-to-one.meta: Import Delivery Order

property.name: arUnitImportDeliveryOrderExpiryDate
property.meta: The time this individual container's delivery order expires.

property.name: arUnitTimeDenormalizeCalc
property.meta: The last time at which denormalized fields were recalculated.

property.name: arUnitTimeLastStateChange
property.meta: The last time at which the UnitVisitState changed.

property.name: arUnitStoppedVessel
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, vessel load is disallowed

property.name: arUnitStoppedRail
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, rail load is disallowed

property.name: arUnitStoppedRoad
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, road delivery is disallowed

property.name: arUnitInbond
property.meta: Container is marked to leave the terminal on a bonded trucker (going inbond, inbond and cancel)

property.name: arUnitExam
property.meta: Container is marked to leave the terminal on a bonded trucker for an exam (onsite, offsite, offsite&return and cancel)

property.name: arUnitRtgTruckingCompany
property.meta: Computed Trucking Compnay in Import Delivery Order

property.name: arUnitFirstReeferRecordAfterInTimeDate
property.meta: date of the first reefer recording done after the active ufv inTime, null if no such reefer recording is present

property.name: arUnitFirstReeferRecordAfterInTimeTemp
property.meta: temp oof the first reefer recording done after the active ufv's inTime, null if no reefer recording is present

property.name: arUnitAttachedPayloadEquipIds
property.meta: listing all payload equipmentIds of this Unit, null if not payload UnitEquipment is associated with this Unit

property.name: arUnitCalculatedCurrentPositionName
property.meta: name of the calculated current position

property.name: arUnitCustomsId
property.meta: Customs id - additional information to identify unit

many-to-one.name: arUnitPrimaryUe
many-to-one.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the primary unit equipment. Can be null.

many-to-one.name: arUnitCarriageUe
many-to-one.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the carriage unit equipment. Can be null.

property.name: arUnitCargoQuantityUnit
property.meta: Volume or weight units (kilograms, gallons, etc.) of cargo quantity

property.name: arUnitGoodsAndCtrWtKgVerfiedGross
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (VGM-Verified Gross Mass) as verified by Terminal.

property.name: arUnitGrossWeightSource
property.meta: Source for the Verified Gross Mass in Unit

property.name: arUnitVgmEntity
property.meta: Verifier of the Gross Mass Ex: Load port, Shipper.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnitFacilityVisit
class.meta: Domain entity representing the passage of a Unit through a Facility

CREATE INDEX ufvar_arrv_pos_anchor_idx ON inv_ar_unit_fcy_visit(arrive_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; CREATE INDEX ufvar_last_pos_anchor_idx ON inv_ar_unit_fcy_visit(last_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

CREATE SPATIAL INDEX ufvar_arrv_pos_anchor_idx ON inv_ar_unit_fcy_visit(arrive_pos_anchor) WITH ( BOUNDING_BOX = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); CREATE SPATIAL INDEX ufvar_last_pos_anchor_idx ON inv_ar_unit_fcy_visit(last_pos_anchor) WITH ( BOUNDING_BOX = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: arUfvOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original UFV before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arUfvHorizon
property.meta: number that presents time_out as horizon

property.name: arUfvVisitState
property.meta: The current state of the Unit with respect to this Facility.

property.name: arUfvTransitState
property.meta: Describes the UFV's transit through the Facility.

component.name: arUfvArrivePositionComp
component.meta: The position on arrival. Will be a truck, train, or vessel position

property.name: arPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: arPosOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: arPosBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

component.name: arUfvLastKnownPositionComp
component.meta: The last known position of the Unit from the perspective of this facility

property.name: arPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: arPosOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: arPosBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arUfvTimeOfLastMove
property.meta: The time at which the ufvLastKnownPosition was most recently updated.

property.name: arUfvTimeOfLoading
property.meta: The time at which the ufv was loaded to the outbound carrier.

property.name: arUfvTimeEcIn
property.meta: Time at which the EC-IN UFV state began (=discharge time for imports)

property.name: arUfvTimeEcOut
property.meta: Time at which the EC-OUT UFV state began (gate transaction complete for delivery)

property.name: arUfvTimeIn
property.meta: The time at which the Unit was received into the facility.

property.name: arUfvTimeOut
property.meta: The time at which the Unit was delivered from the facility.

property.name: arUfvDlvTimeAppntmnt
property.meta: The scheduled time of the delivery appointment.

property.name: arUfvTimeInventory
property.meta: The time at which the Unit's yard position was last confirmed.

property.name: arUfvTimeComplete
property.meta: The time at which this UFV became a historical UFV. If null, it is 'live'.

many-to-one.name: arUfvUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this UnitFacilityVisit belongs

many-to-one.name: arUfvFacility
many-to-one.meta: The Facility of this UnitFacilityVisit

property.name: arUfvSequence
property.meta: The facility calling sequence: 1=first facility, 2=second, etc. 0=unknown

property.name: arUfvIntendedObCvGkey
property.meta: The intended outbound carrier, which may differ from the actual

property.name: arUfvIntendedObCvId
property.meta: The intended outbound carrier, which may differ from the actual

property.name: arUfvYardStowageType
property.meta: Enum giving type of yard stowage required: stacked, wheeled, either

property.name: arUfvIsSparcsStopped
property.meta: True if the simple SPARCS-originated 'stop' is placed on this Unit

property.name: arUfvHasChanged
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has not cleared the change flag

property.name: arUfvVerifiedForLoad
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has verified the Unit for loading

property.name: arUfvVerifiedYardPosition
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has verified the Unit's yard position

property.name: arUfvAnomalyForExpDkng
property.meta: True if SPARCS should ignore this Unit when evaluating types of Units present in Expert Decking

property.name: arUfvActualIbCvGkey
property.meta: The actual inbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically arrived upon. Defined upon facility arrival.

property.name: arUfvActualIbCvId
property.meta: The actual inbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically arrived upon. Defined upon facility arrival.

property.name: arUfvActualObCvGkey
property.meta: The actual outbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically departed upon. Defined upon facility departure.

property.name: arUfvActualObCvId
property.meta: The actual outbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically departed upon. Defined upon facility departure.

property.name: arUfvPaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been paid for Storage

property.name: arUfvGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been guaranteed for Storage

property.name: arUfvGuaranteePartyId
property.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee storage charges

property.name: arUfvPowerLastFreeDay
property.meta: Last Free Day for reefer Power charge

property.name: arUfvPowerPaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which reefer power charges have been paid

property.name: arUfvPowerGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which reefer charges have been guaranteed for Power

property.name: ufvPowerGuaranteePartyId
property.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee reefer charges for Power

property.name: arUfvLineLastFreeDay
property.meta: Last Free Day for Line Storage

property.name: arUfvLinePaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been paid for Line Storage

property.name: arUfvLineGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been guaranteed for Line Storage

property.name: arUfvLineGuaranteePartyId
property.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee line storage charges

property.name: arUfvVisibleInSparcs
property.meta: If TRUE, this Unit is visible in SPARCS

property.name: arUfvIsDirectIbToObMove
property.meta: True if the discharge/load is a direct move to/from road truck.

property.name: arUfvValidateMarryErrors
property.meta: Any error that occurred during the container-chassis marry request.

property.name: arUfvStowFactor
property.meta: Stow Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: arUfvStackingFactor
property.meta: Stacking Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: arUfvSectionFactor
property.meta: Section Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: arUfvReturnToYard
property.meta: If set to true then a UNIT_DELIVER_REJECTED event will be generated when the unit is unloaded

property.name: arUfvMoveCount
property.meta: No. of moves done for a unit during its unit facility visit

property.name: arUfvIsRASPriority
property.meta: True if the Unit should be prioritized by Rail AutoStow

property.name: arUfvPreferredTransferLocation
property.meta: Preferred transfer location at the origin

property.name: arUfvDoorDirection
property.meta: Computed Field to maintain Door Direction based on current Yard Block direction

property.name: arUfvOptimalRailTZSlot
property.meta: Optimal Rail Transfer Zone Slot populated by N4. Readonly for XPS and ECN4

property.name: arUfvCarrierIncompatibleReason
property.meta: Field to manage any carrier incompatibility reason to prevent Load

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnitYardVisit
class.meta: Domain entity representing the handling of a Unit within a Yard

property.name: arUyvOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arUyvUfv
many-to-one.meta: The UnitFacilityVisit to which this UnitYardVisit belongs

property.name: arUyvPkey
property.meta: The SPARCS index for this UYV. This is ONLY used in SPARCS Import processing.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveReeferRecord
class.meta: Domain entity representing a single reefer recording

property.name: arRfrecOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arRfrecUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this ReeferRecord pertains

property.name: arRfrecVentUnit
property.meta: Unit(%,cubic feet per minute, etc. that goes with the vent setting field)

property.name: arRfrecAreDrainsOpen
property.meta: Status of drains (O - Open; C - Closed).

property.name: arRfrecFanSetting
property.meta: Fan setting (H - High; L - Low; A - Alt)

property.name: arRfrecSensor1Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 1 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: arRfrecSensor2Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 2 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: arRfrecSensor3Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 3 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: arRfrecSensor4Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 4 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: arRfrecIsAlarmOn
property.meta: True if Reefer alarm is on.

property.name: arRfrecCreationRefId
property.meta: unique creation reference; used in code for reference to create new reefer record by unit

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveGoodsBase
class.meta: Domain entity representing the valuables/goods being transported

property.name: arGdsOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arGdsIsHazardous
property.meta: TRUE if the Goods contain hazardous substances (denormalization)

property.name: arGdsImdgTypes
property.meta: Comma delimitted list of IMDG types within the Unit (denormalization)

property.name: arGdsThreeMainHazardUNNumbers
property.meta: The UN numbers of the three most severe hazards.

many-to-one.name: arGdsArchiveHazards
many-to-one.meta: The Hazards asscoiated with these Goods. May be null.

property.name: rfreqTempShowFahrenheit
property.meta: If TRUE, users want to see temperatures for this in Fahrenheit, not Centigrade

property.name: rfreqVentUnit
property.meta: Unit (%,cubic feet per minute, etc.) that goes with the vent required field

property.name: rfreqLatestOnPowerTime
property.meta: Time by which the Unit must be on-power to meet customer requirements

property.name: rfreqRequestedOffPowerTime
property.meta: Time by which the Unit should be taken off-power

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor1
property.meta: 1st time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor2
property.meta: 2nd time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor3
property.meta: 3rd time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor4
property.meta: 4th time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqMinutesBeforeUnplugWarning
property.meta: Number of minutes Reefer can be unplugged without perishing its contents

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveGoodsDeclaration
class.meta: Domain entity represents the goods declaration of an Unit Goods

property.name: arGdsdeclOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arGdsdeclArchiveGoods
many-to-one.meta: The Parent Goods

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.ArchiveHazards
class.meta: Domain entity representing a batch of hazardous cargo

property.name: arHzrdOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arHzrdOwnerEntityName
property.meta: The Entity Name of the owner entity

property.name: arHzrdOwnerEntityGkey
property.meta: The Gkey of the owner entity

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.ArchiveHazardItem
class.meta: Domain entity representing a component of hazardous cargo

property.name: arHzrdiOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arHzrdiHazards
many-to-one.meta: The owner Hazards object

property.name: arHzrdiNbrType
property.meta: The Hazard Number classification (United Nations / North America)

property.name: arHzrdiImdgCode
property.meta: Base IMDG Class as a string (does not include explosive class, i.e. 1.2, not 1.2B

property.name: arHzrdiERGNumber
property.meta: The Emergency Response Guide Number that defines how accidents need to be handled.

property.name: arHzrdiWeight
property.meta: Net weight in kilos of the hazardous material

property.name: arHzrdiPlannerRef
property.meta: DG-reference number as allocated by the central planner

property.name: arHzrdiMoveMethod
property.meta: Originated from customer BCT: method by which the CFS will be moved (FORK, etc)

property.name: arHzrdiNotes
property.meta: Some notes for this hazard item.

property.name: arHzrdiFireCodeXML
property.meta: The fire code for this hazard item

property.name: arHzrdiSeq
property.meta: Sequence Number for this hazard item

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnitEquipment
class.meta: Domain entity representing the use of an Equipment by a Unit

property.name: arUeOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original UE before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arUeEqRole
property.meta: The role the Equipment plays with respect to the Unit.

property.name: arUeAttachTime
property.meta: The time the Equipment was first attached to the Unit

property.name: arUeDetachTime
property.meta: The time the Equipment was detached from the Unit

many-to-one.name: arUeUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit of this UnitEquipment

many-to-one.name: arUeEqsDamages
many-to-one.meta: The Damages asscoiated with this Unit Equipment. May be null.

property.name: arUeObsoleteEqUseMode
property.meta: Mode of use of the unit equipment

property.name: arUeBadNbr
property.meta: Records the original EquipId when User has redefined ueEquipment

property.name: arUeIsFolded
property.meta: True if this is a folded flatrack

property.name: arUeSparcsDamageCode
property.meta: The sparcs damage code representing the damages of this unit equipment.

property.name: arUeArrivalOrderType
property.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has arrived at the Complex

property.name: arUeArrivalOrderNbr
property.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has arrived at the Complex

property.name: arUeDepartureOrderType
property.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has departed the Complex

property.name: arUeDepartureOrderNbr
property.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has departed the Complex

property.name: arUeIsReserved
property.meta: True if this unit is reserved for or went out against an order

property.name: arUeObsoleteIsCurrentUse
property.meta: True if this UE represents the current use of the Equipment for this Operator

property.name: arUeObsoleteReturnToLocation
property.meta: Return to location for this UE

property.name: arUePlacarded
property.meta: Has the unit equipment been placarded

property.name: arIdoOriginalGkey
property.meta: Original gkey of this IDO before being archived.

property.name: arIdoId
property.meta: User defined transport delivery order Id

property.name: arIdoIssueDate
property.meta: Date the transport delivery order was issued.

property.name: arIdoExpiryDate
property.meta: The Day the transport delivery order expires.

property.name: arIdoArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this entity was archived.

property.name: arIdoIgnoreDamages
property.meta: If true then the order does not care if container is damaged.

property.name: arIdoIbCvGkey
property.meta: Optional original inbound carrier (e.g. Vessel Visit)

property.name: arIdoIbCvId
property.meta: Optional original inbound carrier (e.g. Vessel Visit)

property.name: arIdoObCarrierOperatorId
property.meta: Designated Trucking Company, Railroad or Barge Operator

many-to-one.name: arIdoComplex
many-to-one.meta: Complex for this Import Delivery Order

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnitEquipDamageItem
class.meta: Domain entity representing damage of the unit equipment

many-to-one.name: arDmgitemDmgs
many-to-one.meta: The collection of damages this item belongs to

property.name: arDmgitemTypeId
property.meta: Damage Type: Examples are BT=BENT, BW=BOWED, CU=CUT, HD=HOLE

property.name: arDmgitemComponentId
property.meta: Damage Component: Examples DAH=Door with Hardware, CPA =Corner Post Assembly, FPB = Flooring-Plain Blank, PAA = Panel Assembly

property.name: arDmgitemLocation
property.meta: Damage Location: Free form entry field which for MnR typically involves something like LT13 (Left Top panels 1 through 3).

property.name: arDmgitemQuantity
property.meta: Damage Quantity: Used for things like multiple cracks, pin-holes, etc. Optional entry

property.name: arDmgitemLength
property.meta: Damage Length: Length of damaged area (optional)

property.name: arDmgitemWidth
property.meta: Damage Width: Width of damaged area (optional)

property.name: arDmgitemDepth
property.meta: Damage Depth: Depth of damaged area (optional)

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveUnitEquipDamages
class.meta: Domain entity representing collection of damages for unit equipment

property.name: arDmgsOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arDmgsOwnerEntityName
property.meta: The Entity Name of the owner entity

property.name: arDmgsOwnerEntityGkey
property.meta: The Gkey of the owner entity

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveEqBaseOrderItem
class.meta: Base class for orders/reservations items for Equipment

property.name: arEqboiOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arEqboiOrder
many-to-one.meta: The Equipment Order item is listed on

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveEqBaseOrder
class.meta: Base class for orders/reservations for Equipment

property.name: arEqboArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this unit was archived.

property.name: arEqboOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arEqboSubType
property.meta: Order subtype, so we can query invisible descriminator

property.name: arEqboNbr
property.meta: Order number, just so we can display this in inventory

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.ArchiveObservedPlacard
class.meta: Domain entity representing a single observed placard

property.name: arObsplacardOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

many-to-one.name: arObsplacardUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this ObservedPlacard pertains

property.name: arObsplacardPlacardGkey
property.meta: Dangerous Goods Label Markings. It's fairly normal to have up to 5 placards but there could be more.

property.name: arObsplacardPlacardText
property.meta: Dangerous Goods Label Markings. It's fairly normal to have up to 5 placards but there could be more.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ArchiveGoodsDocuments
class.meta: Domain entity representing the customs documents being associated with an Unit Goods

property.name: arGdsdocOriginalGkey
property.meta: gkey of the original Unit before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arGdsdocArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this unit was archived.

many-to-one.name: arGdsdocGoodsDeclaration
many-to-one.meta: The Goods owning these Documents.
